```{python}
from dotenv import load_dotenv
import requests
import polars as pl
load_dotenv()
```

```{python}
base = 'https://api.census.gov/data/timeseries/'
key = os.getenv("CENSUS_API_KEY")
flow = 'intltrade/exports/statenaics'
param = 'CTY_CODE,CTY_NAME,ALL_VAL_MO,COMM_LVL,NAICS'
time = '2022-12' 
```
This api call is the one that equal to the FRED data
```{python}
url = f'{base}{flow}?get={param}&STATE=PR&key={key}&time={time}'
r = requests.get(url).json()
df = pl.DataFrame(r)
names = df.select(pl.col("column_0")).transpose()
df = df.drop("column_0").transpose()
df = df.rename(names.to_dicts().pop())
df = df.filter((pl.col("COMM_LVL") == "NA4") & (pl.col("CTY_NAME") == "TOTAL FOR ALL COUNTRIES"))
df = df.select(["time", "ALL_VAL_MO"]).rename({"ALL_VAL_MO": "census_value"})
df = df.with_columns(pl.col("census_value").cast(pl.Int64),
                      (pl.col("time") + "-01").str.to_datetime("%Y-%m-%d").alias("time")
                     )
df = df.group_by("time").agg(pl.sum("census_value"))

df
```
